name: Hex Dice War
description:
Hex Dice War

You battle with your dice army against AI players on a hexagon world.

  • 10 different hexagon worlds
  • Up to 5 AI players

It's a risk-like battling game with huge influence from dicewars using game assets from Kenney. It was made with Godot 3.5 and is the first game I released to the public.

I made the game because I wanted a somewhat nicer looking dice war game, which I could play on my phone, with no strings attached.

Currently available as windows executable or android app.
